short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension adds Kurdish CC to Youtube

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Enjoy watching YouTube videos with subtitles that translate in real time. This easy-to-use extension isn't just for Kurdish. It works with many languages like Persian, Arabic, and Turkish too. It's really handy for Kurdish speakers in places like Iran, Iraq, Syria, and Turkey. And no matter what you're watching – learning stuff, shows, or just fun videos – you can get the subtitles you need with just a click.
